subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
Running
lead_paragraph: When the participants in the New York City Marathon line up on Sunday, they will have the support — not in spirit, but in dollars — of thousands of other runners who could not make it to the starting line.
snippet: When the participants in the New York City Marathon line up on Sunday, they will have the support — not in spirit, but in dollars — of thousands of other runners who could not make it to the starting line.
